name: Sugar Lip Balm Hydrating Treatment
about: What it is: A 24hr hydrating lip balm powered by sugar from beet root and sugar cane that offers sheer, buildable color with a smooth, buttery texture....Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Balm..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Sugar: Scientifically shown to have a long-lasting hydrating effect..- Cranberry Seed Oil: Smooths..- Grapeseed Oil: Softens...What Else You Need to Know: The #1 Lip Treatment Brand in the US*, Fresh now offers a new & improved Sugar lip balm with 24hr hydration and sheer-to-buildable color that complements different skin tones for soft, smooth lips. Infused with sugar and plant-based fruit oils, this clear or tinted lip balm leaves lips feeling and looking healthy...Clinical Results:.*Source: The NPD Group/U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Department/Specialty, Skincare Dollar Sales, Jan-May 2022.-24hr proven hydration even as color wears**.-95% agreed it moisturized, softened & protected against dryness***.-97% agreed lips looked and felt smoother***.**instrumental test, 11 subjects ***self-assessment, 62 subjects, 4 weeks...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Sugar: Scientifically shown to have a long-lasting hydrating effect..-Cranberry Seed Oil: Smooths..-Grapeseed Oil: Softens....Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Hydroxystearic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Ethyl Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Propyl Gallate, Limonene, Citral, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake)] <20032>
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply on lips as needed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this lip balm. I wear it everyday, it is the perfect amount of colour and very moisturizing. I donu2019t like wearing heavy lipsticks so this is exactly what I needed. Iu2019ve repurchased 10+ times.

reviews.review_title: A must have lip balm for everyone.

reviews.review_text: I discovered this lip balm when it first came out and was apprehensive about the price to say the least, but this lip balm is worth every penny. It protects, nourishes, and taste and smells like heaven. Not glossy or sticky.

reviews.review_title: Reformulated version is dry, no more SPF!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

The new formula leaves my lips chapped and dry, and is a complete waste of time now that it doesn't provide sun protection.  So sad about this change!

reviews.review_title: Is it the best or worst? nah!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to LOVE this lip balm and use nothing else. I used to go through a tube so quickly. Now that the formula doesnu2019t use SPF, I can only use it at night before bed which is really disappointing. I liked the formula and how hydrated it kept my lips and how I didnu2019t have to worry about sun damage. Really wish Fresh would offer an SPF option at the very least. It seems counterintuitive to remove an ingredient from your product that can help prevent sun damage and skin cancer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve seen a lot of complaints about the new formula, but I honestly canu2019t tell difference between the new and old other than the removal of SPF. If you let the balm warm up to your lip temperature the first time you use it, itu2019ll soften and glide easily every time after that. I like to make a few passes over my lips to get them nicely moistened. It lasts a few hours but not all day, and occasionally my lips get dry and peel if I donu2019t reapply, but that happens with most lipsticks and tinted balms for me. Exfoliate with a little sugar and olive or almond oil, and youu2019re good to go! Iu2019d lament the lack of SPF, but itu2019s not a dealbreaker since Iu2019ve never gotten sunburned on my lips. Iu2019m wearing Papaya in the photo, and I love it for summer. Petal matches my natural lip color and works year round.

reviews.review_title: Need to take lip treatment off the tube
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It had been a while since I'd last purchased this product and since I still have one of the older lip treatments as a comparison, I can definitely say that something about the formula has changed and not for the better.  This new one was very dry, almost matte, going on, which I found strange, but initially put down to it just being new.  But after about 30 minutes, noticed that my lips were very dry--painfully dry--like when I wear a liquid lipstick.  I wiped it off and reapplied, same thing.  Instead of looking hydrated and plump, my lips looked dried-out and shriveled--not the look I'm going for, especially at my age, and they hurt. The color is still lovely (hence the two-star rating), and I still wear it, but when I do, I have to wear another lip balm underneath because this so-called lip treatment is so drying.  I later found out that Fresh had been sold to another company (it think to Estee Lauder or L'Oreal) and that the product had been reformulated.  Figures.

Iu2019ve given them out as Christmas presents to very happy friends. I love the metal tube which makes it easy to feel when I reach in my bag. Iu2019ve tried their other lip products, but none seem to work as well for me as this one. It is pricey but so worth it. I buy in bulk every year when Sephora does their VIB sale.

reviews.review_title: New reformulation is absolute garbage. Avoid!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All these glowing reviews are for the OLD formula! Sorry to say those days are gone. Shame on them for riding on the good reviews of a product that doesn't exist anymore. They ought to start a new page for the reformulation disaster. This USED TO be my holy grail. I think I went through 10 tubes of the Clear and Honey. Sadly, it's awful now.  I normally find people to be very dramatic about reformulations but this is the worst reformulation I've ever seen of a beloved classic (or of any cosmetic I've ever seen, tbh).  -Old Formula: Buttery, soft, smooth, hydrating, shiny, and WITH SPF. A dream.  -Current Formula: Dry, almost chalky, no hydration, not smooth, not moisturizing, and NO SPF.  I might as well throw my multiple tubes in the trash. I'm gutted because I stocked up on these during the last sale and I wasn't able to start using them until after the return window was over, so I didn't even realize they were reformulated since I had so many other tubes to use up first :(

reviews.review_title: Favorite lip product of all time.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This will forever be the only lip product I need! I hate lip stains and lipstick because of how dry they make my lips, and lip glosses are always way too sticky. But it is also buildable, so you can definitely get more color out of it if desired. I have tried 4 different colors - Bloom, Petal, Honey and Berry - and I love them all. I keep several in my purse at all times and use whatever color I'm in the mood for that day. SUCH a great product, I am so glad it exists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing formula for all of them. I tried several colors because I didn't know which one I would like. Peony is the top swatch in the photos. There's Petal in the middle, much more reddish with almost a tinge of orangey, and Bloom, which looks very much like Peony but is a bit more saturated pink when you put several layers on. With a sheer amount on, Bloom and Peony looked the same on me.  This feels like a lip balm so it's very sheer at first, very hydrating. I kept Peony and it never made my lips dry in any way. The color does go away eventually so you need to reapply over the day, however I felt that it stayed on for a good amount of time, especially if your lips aren't too dry and the product stays on your lips rather than get absorbed. It also smells very nice, a bit like candy, but not too strong so it's not distracting. A very nice product over all!!

There's Petal in the middle, much more reddish with almost a tinge of orangey, and Peony, which looks very much like Bloom but is a bit more burgundy/mauvy when you put several layers on. With a sheer amount on, Bloom and Peony looked the same on me.  This feels like a lip balm so it's very sheer at first, very hydrating. I kept Peony and it never made my lips dry in any way. The color does go away eventually so you need to reapply over the day, however I felt that it stayed on for a good amount of time, especially if your lips aren't too dry and the product stays on your lips rather than get absorbed. Now it seems to not melt as much, but it feels a lot more waxy and harder to apply to the lips. It's also not as moisturizing as it used to be and doesn't last very long at all. The pigment is nice on the brighter/darker colors, but almost non-existent on the lighter ones. The SPF used to be a big benefit from these but it is not in the new formula. Super disappointing considering I recently bought a few. I'll definitely be looking for a different lip balm.

reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this given that many reviews say the new formula isn't as good as the old one, but I'm so happy I did! This is one of the most moisturizing lip balms I've ever used, and the shades are gorgeous too. They all have a sheer, slightly matte finish that looks like a really natural hint of color. They have a light, natural (spa-like?) scent upon first applying them. The packaging is very sturdy too. I pick at my lips a lot and these balms are great at getting rid of the dryness and flakiness. I have fair, cool skin and love Petal as a soft pinky-nude and Bloom as a natural true pink.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been buying this for over 15 yearsu2026the reformation is horrid. Taking out the SPF without actively notifying customers is *really* disgusting and shameful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Havenu2019t tried the new formula personally, but based on reviews Iu2019ll be looking at other options now. Why do companies mess with highly successful products?!?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be a staple for me and at least 5 other people I know and we are all EXTREMELY disappointed with the new formulation. It's like they took out the SPF and put in an odd waxy ingredient that doesn't apply well and dries out your lips. I bought one on a trip (no Sephora where I live) and I thought it was just me since I hadn't purchased one is a year or so. I couldn't return so Ive kept using it because it is so expensive! I was with my mother who is also a fan and bought several of the originals before they switched. We shared a bag for our outing and I accidentally grabbed hers and I was FLOORED by the difference. It glides across the lips, feels hydrating, lasting shine, and just a phenomenal product. I was told they changed the formula to remove the SPF to pander to Sephora's clean campaign. I hope they listen to the consumers who want the original product. Definitely will not purchase again or anything within the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awful!! Super drying and drags acrosss lips while leaving a bright red ring around my lips and little to no pigment on the rest of my lips. Formula is very waxy and dry and isnu2019t moisturizing. Iu2019m sad I missed out on the original formula everyone talks about

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite products. Itu2019s hydrating and you donu2019t have to put on a lot of product to have it do so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my #1 holy grail beauty item for over a decade, and they have ruined it. The reformulation is terrible and so drying. I was reaching to reapply every 10 minutes instead of every few hours and thought I must have gotten a bad couple of tubes, but then I read about the change and I am furious. To the executives at Fresh who thought this was a good idea: you destroyed perfection, and you should be ashamed. To everyone else: don't waste your money, this is no longer a good product. And no SPF? Total waste.

It is dry, matte, not hydrating, and my go-to color doesn't even look the same on my lips. It's so much darker. I cannot express how much I detest this change. A perfect product has been turned into an unusable hot mess. Do better. Change it back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the Peony color, when Bloom wasn't in stock, hoping that it would be similar. Once I tried the lip balm I was shocked at how dry it was and thought maybe I had gotten an old one. I should have returned the two I purchased right then, but I thought maybe I just needed to apply a few more times and it wouldn't be so bad. However, upon ordering my favorites (Bloom and Rose, which I would always stock up on) I realized the issue was with all the balms. I USED to be the biggest fan of the Fresh Sugar lip treatments. I kept repurchasing this product in multiple colors for nearly 10 years! But, I have now returned my recent orders. The formula has changed and most of the lip balms are very dry (especially compared to the past balms). Also, these no longer have SPF 15 which was one of my favorite things about the product - you got hydrating sun protection in a variety of pretty colors. Thatu2019s why I always had these in my purse, my bathroom, and my office. They were my favorite. The price for these balms hasnu2019t gone down, but the quality definitely has.  Like many other fans (as you can see in reviews) Iu2019m very disappointed in the changes and wish they would BRING BACK THE OLD FORMULA!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10 years ago when I bought this, I hated it. It was super mushy, and I hated the feeling. I love this new version! It is firmer and easier to apply. The color payoff is great, and it is moisturizing. I love the Honey color. This is my new go-tou2026so much so that Iu2019m now using it in place of my Lisa Eldridge lipsticks. I love those but wanted something more natural-looking and hydrating, and this reformulated Fresh balm fits the bill perfectly. Please donu2019t go back to the old version!

reviews.review_title: New formula genuinely affects this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard about this going through a formula change, but always like to give a product a try myself, especially as I didn't really ever faithfully use this product. I had probably gone through two tubes of this over the past few years. Well.... unfortunately, the formula change is VERY noticeable, even to me.  What's different:   - The packaging is less heavy/less luxe feeling; it's immediately noticeable - This formula feels far more drying than it used to (my lips actually got more chapped, it seemed, after using this all day, and even BLED a little from the dryness!) - This isn't nearly as creamy as it once was - I have to apply significantly more product for a color payoff (whereas when I used this exact shade before, it didn't take more than one light swipe)  This used to be a product that I could justify spending the $20+ dollars on every once in a while for a tube of fancy lip product, but now, it is definitely not worth the hefty price tag. Somehow Fresh made this product feel cheaper and overall much worse, while continuing to charge excessively for it.  It's unfortunate that because of its previous hype and previous genuinely great formula, people may not realize it is not nearly what it used to be.  Overall, 2 stars for the eventual color payoff of the Honey shade (it's pretty), and the same classic smell of this product that I love seeming to stay intact. But I feel like even 2 stars is a bit generous, due to the price tag of this.  Overall, try it for yourself if you must - for me, it ended up in a yep, everyone complaining about the new formula is absolutely correct and a quick return. There are way better options in this category, now.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color but dries out quick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I owned my first sugar lip balm several years ago, and I'd been a loyal customer ever since. I've always enjoyed how it moisturized my lips and gave it a warm pop of color so that I can skip the lipstick when in a rush.   With the new formula, I believe it is better in terms of color delivery: it's more sheer, which may be a negative for some, but I like that because it sort of enhances its quality as a lip balm and not full-on lipstick, which feels lightweight on my lips and appears more natural, especially for the darker colors I purchase. However, it doesn't have that same emollient effect as before. When I apply it, immediately, it's greatu2014moisturizing and smoothu2014but it makes my lips dry after 20 minutes or so, which requires constant re-application.   That's a bummer, especially as in previous years, one lip balm was able to last me a very long time. Compared to one year or two that I savored one lip balm with the previous formula, the most recent one I bought in plum lasted me six to seven months. That's still very long, but not like how it used to be.   Overall, it's great now for adding a sheer, natural flush of color to the lips, and for the lip balm feature itself, there are better ones. But, I'd exploit Sephora's return policy and still try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like many others here I'm also a loyal, long-time user of this tinted balm. I loved the creaminess, color payoff, shine and SPF of the original product. I even stuck with it after my fave shades would get discontinued (RIP Passion!).   This new formula is a total bummer-- very waxy, low pigmentation, and not moisturizing at all. Also it WILL NOT stick to my full lips, only the outermost parts that are never moistened from the inside of my mouth, if that makes sense. This is now a tinted balm that doesn't provide color or moisture, all yours for $24!    Here's a tip for using the new formula if you're stuck with it because you missed the window for returns like I did: Rub the stick on your fingertip first to warm it up, then apply the melted balm on your finger to your lips. Rubbing the stick directly on your lips will only result in pulled skin and disappointment.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful red, but hold on to the aquaphor
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this as a subtle red to wear everyday which is what I bought it for, but don't expect it to your main lip balm if you have chapped lips like I do. Buy it for the color, not the moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I expected more lip hydration and less pigment. But itu2019s quite dry and the shade -at least the u201cclassic redu201d- is too strong for me.  The packaging looks fancy, strong and itu2019s heavy, which I like it.

reviews.review_title: Part of my day and night routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product over a month ago and it is my part of my morning (because SPF) and night routine! I have a bad habit of peeling my lips and putting this on at night rejuvenates them. It is definitely a MUST HAVE!

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t listen to u201cgiftedu201d product reviews
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think itu2019s really suspect and uncool that the general feedback for new formulation is flooded with five star u201cgifted by freshu201d reviews. Meanwhile by my estimate nearly every loyal customer finds the new product drying, waxy, and a major disappointment. Almost like Fresh knew they were producing an inferior balm and tried to safeguard to maintain decent rating. SHAME ON THEM. I get removing the SPF to meet consumer safety regulations, but surely they could create something similarly hydrating and pigmented??   repeat

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to lip product for years but the most recent stick I purchased is like a different product. Itu2019s not as glossy, it itu2019s drying on my lips, and it has none of the great qualities that the orignal formulation had. I am so disappointed!! Why mess with a great thing?!original four

reviews.review_title: A Holy Grail Reformulated to A Complete Fail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Berry for years and years, daily. It is my holy grail lip balm. So buttery and pleasant. However, the reformulation has reduced it to a cheap imitation with that gross mass-market chemical taste and much waxier. My lips suffered. So disappointed.

I created the account to say it was a DISASTER! This something - can't call it other way... was melty since it arrived, smearing all over. Today I tried for the last time and it completely disintegrated. Must be a terrible batch...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this lip balm for years after a lot of trial and error with other brands. Fresh has recently changed the formula for this balm and it's much, much drier than it used to be. It's similar to the cheap $2 waxy chapstick that seemingly sucks the moisture out of your lips. They also removed the SPF, which is a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm was gifted by Fresh beauty. A 24hr hydrating lip balm powered by sugar from beet root and sugar cane that offers sheer, buildable color with a smooth, buttery texture.keeps lips smooth and softer. Lips stays hydrated and has light color for long time. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kinda pricey but worth it, to me. Not overly shiny, great buildable color and very moisturizing. Honey is usually my go to, my lips but better shade. Since itu2019s about to be fall I wanted to try something a little darker!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE put the spf back in the formula!! Thatu2019s why I kept buying. Think old formula was a little better and thicker, but I mostly just want the spf back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to for everyday use! Iu2019ve been using it for years. Obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why mess with perfection?! I honestly donu2019t know what Iu2019m going to do without the old version of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed! This is not the same Fresh Sugar lip treatment that I have used in the past. They took out the SPF. Why? That was a main selling point for me. Also, not as moisturizing as it used to be. Why?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product gifted by Fresh and love that it does come off too dark right away and you are able to build color. It is not super thin or wet, has a harder consistency that you have to give a few coats to your lips to get the full nourishing effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my staples! Love it, goes on smooth with a light tint.

reviews.review_title: Don't bother buying the new formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The new, reformulated version isn't nearly as soft and moisturizing as the old. I've been using this product for years and I hate what they've done to it. I could live without the SPF, but the texture is terrible, not even close to being as moisturizing as before, and I have to reapply less than an hour later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite lip balm. Lasts so much longer than any other Iu2019ve ever used and the tint is just enough to give some colour to my lips without it being overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product since 2011, and I freaked out when it diapered. Now it's back but the new formula is not as amazing. Not nearly as hydrating and balmy/cushiony as previously. I am very sad as this used to be one of VERY few products that actually worked for my lips to stay hydrated. And they removed the SPF as well....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So they disappeared and came back different! At least Icon is way dryer than the old formulation. Definitely returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: They have ruined this product!!  I have twelve different colors in the old formulation. I love them and wear them all the time. This new formulation is dry and has no color, the exact opposite of the old. I canu2019t believe they ruined what was a spectacular product. product.hopFresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Re-purchased this product multiple times in the past! Was my go-to and loved that it had SPF. The new formula isnu2019t very good- waxy and strange feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my go-to lip moisturizer. Since they changed the formula, it feels like some cheap drug store moisturizer. Time to look for a new lip moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s such a bummer they changed the formula. They removed the SPF, and itu2019s sadly not as creamy and fabulous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t like the texture and itu2019s not moisturizing. Itu2019s kind of pasty wax.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this in the past, both as a single tube and a set. I received my order yesterday and am so disappointed. It used to be a soft creamy balm. They must have changed the composition because it is now like old fashioned chapstick with color. Not buying this agian.

reviews.review_title: Products runs out in three weeks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is overhyped and doesn't last long. Every time I buy a tube it lasts for 3 weeks and then I have to purchase another chapstick. Considering this is so expensive, it's NOT worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this balm, specifically the petal one, but they were out so I got original. What happened? This one is so much less creamy. Is it because itu2019s original or because they changed the formula? It leaves my lips feeling drier and it used to be my holy grail. Also it looked like it had been used already when I got it out of the box :(((

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Fresh to me for review purposes. This product adds just enough color for no makeup days. Itu2019s buildable,  but look great with just one swipe. Application wise, it almost feels like a lip oil, very nourishing and comfortable on the lips. Definitely a purse staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving this product 4 stars because the colour payoff isnu2019t as vibrant as shown in the picture. Otherwise itu2019s a smooth and hydrating lip balm. I really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this product.  It was smooth, soft, sheer, hydrating, tasted nice.  Now it is more like a lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE all the other Fresh products I have tried so far, so I was very excited to try the sugar lip treatment lip balm that I was gifted by Fresh. I chose the color Rose and I love how subtle it is, but it is also very buildable so you are able to use other lip color over it while still getting all the hydrating benefits. I also love that itu2019s made with natural ingredients like beet root, sugar cane, and up-cycled cranberry seed oil. It left my lips so soft and hydrated feeling after just one use. Thank you, Fresh for never disappointing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite things from Sephora. Itu2019s such a nice color and is the best lip balm Iu2019ve found so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought sooooooo many of the old formula of this. I initially bought it for the spf to wear with makeup-less looks like at the beach & on vacation and it soon became my go to lip with a little liner every day almost. The tint lasts hours. Iu2019d reapply maybe once or twice out of habit. The tube was metal and high quality, now itu2019s a little less quality. I just purchased a new one and had no idea they took the spf out, Iu2019m kind of bummed. Seems they should have gotten less expensive in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip Balm so much, I literally carry it everywhere wherever I go. Itu2019s a staple in my routine and the only thing that keeps my lips hydrated and moisturized in dry CT winters. Also this lip sugar treatment gives a very natural flush of color to my lips and instantly adds some life into it. It also has a light rose fragrance which is absolutely beautiful and it has no taste at all which is a huge plus for me as I do not like the lip balms that leaves a taste in your mouth. Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything from fresh specially their regular lip balm. I was so excited when they came out the balm with colors but when I tried it on it made my lips more dry. Itu2019s not worth of $$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product gifted by fresh so far and notice that it makes my lips more smooth and moisturized. It is just a tint color, so I tend to pair it with a lip gloss on top.  Itu2019s easy to carry around in my bag too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go-to for years. The new formula is dry and wears off in literally minutes. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was happy to try this lip treatment complimentary from fresh. The packaging feels high end and heavy which I like. The color application is also pigmented and beautiful. I personally didnu2019t find the lip treatment to feel hydrating. I actually felt like it made my lips feel a little dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why some people find this moisturizing! Itu2019s seriously overpriced for a product that actually does the opposite. I usually put it on before bedtime like I have with other lip balms, and my lips end up unusually dried out in the morning, unlike with other lip balms Iu2019ve had before. The only pros are the packaging. The color also doesnu2019t show up if you have tan skin or darker. What a disappointment.

reviews.review_title: love! great texture, colour, and formulation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought honey in the old formula way back and the spf caused a bad skin reaction which is why I love this current formulation and was super happy to repurchase. It is a bit on the drier side so it gives a more satin like finish rather than glossy yet had no issues with hydration. This time I bought peony and plum and both are amazing colours for my medium skin! Looks super natural and polished. I see myself reaching for these these everyday and more often then any other balm or lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think the tube I purchased must be very old because it is dry. I've used this glosses before and loved how emollient it is. This one is definitely NOT

reviews.review_title: AWFUL new formula. Bring back the old version!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This USED to be my absolute fave lip balm. It was the most moisturizing, had spf, and imparted a perfect pop of color. I bought it in bulk because I couldn't stand to run out. Sadly, the new formula is awful!!! Instead of being moisturizing, it is DRYING. And, it no longer has spf. This is such an expensive chapstick. It used to be worth it, because it was literally the best thing ever. Now it is actually terrible. I am beyond disappointed :( I really hope they bring back the old formula. I won't be buying this formulation again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the new Papaya color and I really love it! I'm sad the SPF was removed though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the moisturizing and properties of the Sugar Lip Balm that was gifted by Fresh, but didnu2019t love the color for myself. I used this product a few times in the morning and before bed and had NO CHAPPED OR DRY lips so it works for sure! Iu2019d recommend & id buy in a different color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Fresh Sugar Lip Balms. The moisturizing feel, scent, even the taste when you lick your lips. I have a few but when they introduced new colours, I jumped at the chance to grab you. Warning, the online swatches do not match what you get with Papaya: it is neon coral on the. It is only after it wears down (20-30 minutes later) that it starts to look like it describesu2026 a pink coral. You canu2019t see the brightness from my photo but it bright. I recommend the lip balm, but not this particular colouru2026. unless youu2019re looking for that 80u2019s neon lip.

reviews.review_title: STOP WASTING TIME AND BUY IT NOW!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it is very rare that i make reviews on here, but ahh! this lip balm is gorgeous. iu2019ve been very loyal to my glossier balm dot coms these past three years, but i decided to step out of my comfort zone and iu2019m glad i did! when i took my tube out of its box (which the box is very gorgeous btw i donu2019t want to throw it out!) the first thing i noticed how heavy the packaging felt, very heavy in the most luxurious way possible, i was not expecting that but iu2019m glad thatu2019s the way it is because no one wants something at this price point in a flimsy tube. the tiny is so pretty, itu2019s very rare that we see browny-nude colors in tinted lip balms, usually itu2019s berries and pinks. when i put it on my lips it felt like butter, the scent smelled like a nearly cakey lemon buttercream not too overbearingly sweet but slightly fresh as well, which i personally love! it reminds me of something i had in my childhood. this stuff SOFTENS my lips. iu2019ve tried dior, glossier, clinique, burtu2019s bees, cover girl, you name it. this tinted lip balm is a WINNER! tied for first place along with my birthday balm dot com from glossier. this stuff is so moisturizing, soften, slightly plumping and smells delicious. itu2019s a cult favourite for many reasons i now understand. iu2019m completely blown away by this, it has surpassed my expectations to the point where iu2019m considering getting another shade. get it now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the previous version of this lip one and updated as good. It has great nourishing ingredients and feels very hydrating on the lips it has pretty natural lip color and makes my lip look very healthy and natural. Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a nice color that isn't too dark. smooth and light on lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this at another store and I was really happy to see they brought back plum. This and rose were my favorite shades and I was sad when they discontinued plum. The new formula is thicker and shows up much darker and less sheer than the original plum. The formula felt nice at first but really dried out my lips eventually and felt irritating. The color was pretty but just too dark and gathered in dry parts of my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. I stopped using it years ago because it felt too gloppy and the colors didn't flatter. But now I really like Honey and Cocoa. I'm over 40 and it's hard to find a flattering shade for work: something that looks natural, only better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like the new formula! I tried this product years ago with the old formula and didnu2019t like it and felt it wasnu2019t that moisturizing and not worth the price. This one on the other hand feels so light and moisturizing. I personally donu2019t need my lip balms to be super pigmented like Iu2019ve noticed others complaining about so I donu2019t mind that itu2019s a relatively sheer color. I bought papaya and you still get a really beautiful and natural color out of it. Definitely want to try some more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the new formulation because I loved the old one, but it is nowhere near as good as the old formula. It feels like any basic lip balm you can buy at the drugstore. There is no soft, velvety feel that the old one used to have that was my favorite part of the lip balm. The smell is also very reduced. I am very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this lip treatment but the new formula they took away all the reasons I loved it. No more SPF and it is not at all hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great product, love the smell and especially the light tint of color on my lips. I only didn't give it a 5 star because my lips are used to carmex and this doesn't last as long but could for others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest, I was really looking forward to using this because it smelled so good in the store, even though I couldn't sample it. For the price, I was expecting something extraordinary. Instead, it sits on top of the lips and disappears so quickly that I would reapply so many times a day. I guess I'm the unpopular opinion, but I'm a huge lip balm freak so I know what works for me. I would suggest spending your coin on something more moisturizing and long-lasting.

Boooooooo!! The new formula is dry, has barely any tint, and there is no spf. What am I even using this for? I am so incredibly bummed because this had been my go-to lip balm for several years. Bring back the old formula please!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this lip product! A little goes a long way and really gets a nice red pigment on your lips that isnt sticky at all. Would definitley reccomend to others also gives you a hydrating lip texture. Gifted by fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Beauty's lip balms are a favorite! Its effective plus gives a nice tint. Its nourishing and a great product to keep on hand, I like the screw in packaging, its different but gives a nice luxe feel to the product. I have received this product complimentary from Fresh but these are my honest thoughts.

I carry this lip treatment balm everywhere I go. It gives me the the perfect tint to my lips.. especially for the summer! The actual treatment itself feels amazing, and surprisingly last longer than other competitors. I am tempted to try other shades. xx complimentary from Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this complimentary from Fresh. I absolutely love this lip treatment! It smells and feels amazing on the lips and seriously keeps them hydrated all day. The packaging is also sleek and very aesthetic. I would definitely recommend giving this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh. I love that this product softens and moisturizes the lip. I have dry lips and this has been a game changer! It does plump the lips as well. It smells amazing which is always a plus for me! The one thing I didnu2019t like about it was the color on my fair skin. I will order a different color since I do love the Fresh Lip Treatments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me and I absolutely love it! Itu2019s very buildable and makes my lips feel great. Itu2019s hydrating and itu2019s perfect for on the go because I can fit it in my bag. Iu2019d definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really beautiful red lip if that you can apply sheer or build up to be more bold. It isn't quite as hydrating as I had hoped for, but it doesn't cling to dry patches or tug on my lips. I find that it works best if I use a normal lip balm underneath and then layer this one, and the color does last a long time. I received this product complimentary from Fresh in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about hydrating your beautiful lips. This is just a fantastic Chapstick/lip color. Iu2019m obsessed with the benefits that come with using this. Let me tell you when I say this is the best I have used I mean it. My lips are exfoliating fresh plum lush looking the color is minimal but looks so yummy for summertime. I highly recommend.gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the lip balm ICON, which is a red one. I have a warm neutral undertone and find it a little bit hard to wear the lip balm without makeup just because I have a yellow undertone wearing a red lip balm. Besides the color, I think the packing is ready to close and open, especially for the one who has disabitilies and finds it hard to open a lipstick, which is my friend's case.  The moisture that it gives to the lips is unreal because I had bad dry lips before getting it and now my lips are fully recovered and not dry anymore. * gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a really big lip balm fan and I love tinted balms. I was so excited to try a new color. This is a really creamy consistency like you would expect if youu2019ve used Fresh before. The color is really buildable without looking too much like lipstick. It feels lightweight and leaves my lips hydrated like a normal balm but with just the right hint of color. This was gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hated the original formula, but I decided to give this another try after hearing they reformulated. DANG. This is single handedly the best, most luxurious, lip balm Iu2019ve ever tried. Both in formula and packaging, this is definitely worth the $24

To say this is my new obsession does not even cover it! Gifted by Fresh and I couldnu2019t be happier. This is such a refreshing and cute colored lippie that will be placed into my purse at all times. I would highly recommend this affordable product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it.  Lasts for a good while and lips definitely soft moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how hydrating and nourishing this lip treatment is that I was gifted by Fresh Beauty. It doesn't take much for that effect. However, you can build the shade to your liking, which is a nice bonus for me. Just two coats was perfect for my personal liking. I love the shade that I received and will continue using this. It is the ultimate no makeup makeup staple this summer. This was my first Fresh product and I absolutely love that the lid twists on, great for traveling.

reviews.review_title: are we about to kiss rn?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To preface, this product was gifted to me by fresh. This lip balm is amazing!! The moment I tried it on I noticed my lips felt SO moisturized. I also love how buildable the color is - super versatile for all seasons. :) no choice but to stan. I will say it took me a minute to figure out how to open because I thought you just pulled the lid (newsflash its a twist lid lol!) you won't regret this purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Sugar Icon Tinted Lip Balm complimentary from Fresh. The formula is soft, moisturizing, with a subtle shine. Not waxy or too thick. The sheer tint is perfect for everyday wear. Thereu2019s no scent or flavor. Most lip products dry my lips out instantly, but not this. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ce baume est incroyable! Leger mais hydratant et super diaphane!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the SLT Icon! Such a gorgeous reddish pink color. Perfect lip tint, super sheer and buildable for an even bolder color! Has such a yummy fruity scent. My lips feel so much more hydrated and soft :) gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by fresh- extremely hydrating and smells amazing. Having champed lips in the summer is the worst and this has been my go-to! It even adds a very subtle lip color which I absolutely love! I would 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When first applying the lip balm it comes off patchy but after applying more product the color becomes evenly layered. Itu2019s not as moisturizing as I thought it would be. The product feels light on the lips and not sticking which I like. Complimentary from Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the formula of this lip treatment! It is very nourishing to the lips, all while giving color. This specific color is not for me but I am positively sure that I can find a color that is for me! It was complimentary from Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Fresh and I love it! It is so easy to build up the color and I think it would look great on everyone.  I love that it feels like a lip balm but adds color. My lips feel so hydrated and I have been using this everyday. I would recommend this to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by fresh! Fresh lip products are amazing and this is now my third tube! I love how great they make your lips feel and with an added bonus this particular shade has a red tint to give you an extra look of luxury!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product that I got complimentary from Fresh so much! It has sustainable ingredients, smells literally amazing, and has a buildable color so you can decide how bold of a red lip you want. It kept my lips hydrated and smooth and lasted all night long. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it worked well but was gentle enough on my lips . Also the color is perfect and Subtle for a natural look . The smell is sweet and was not overwhelming. Perfect for standalone use or use before putting on a lipstick or stain!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are noticeably softer and hydrated! They were feeling dry prior to application the oil blend feels very smooth. The pigment comes through and works well as a base. Complimentary from Fresh. Gifted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lip treatment complimentary from Fresh. I like that this is a lip treatment. I does give my lips a lot of moisture thatu2019s last through the day. The buildable coverage is a nice touch, you can really personalize the color you want. Not a huge fan of the scent. It smells like a lip smackers chapstick from the 90s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Reformulated?? Iu2019ve been buying these for over 10 years and this new formula is terrible. Itu2019s so dry. I know the old formula was soft but thatu2019s what made it feel so nice and moisturizing. This one Iu2019ve been dragging across multiple times for barely any balm and absolutely no color. Also causing some tingling and irritation.

reviews.review_title: This lippie is a must have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh.  This lip treatment is absolutely stunning. I enjoy the main ingredients which are sugar, vitamin c/e, cranberry seed oil and grape-seed oil. The color on the first swipe is pigmented, and you can continue to build it up for its full pigmentation. Icon is a beautiful red/orangey color. I love how hydrated my lips are and how the color looks on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh gifted me this lip treatment. Itu2019s so nourishing and hydrating on the lips. I really enjoy the formula and love that it has sugar and fruit oils in it. I got the shade Icon, which is red. With it being in a format of a lip balm, itu2019s hard to apply such a bold color neatly. I would recommend sticking with more neutral colors that wonu2019t be as messy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh, their Sugar Tinted Lip Balm in color Icon in exchange for my honest review.  It is a 24 hour hydrating lip balm containing beetroot and sugar cane that provides sheer, buildable coverage with a smooth buttery texture.  It is infused with sugar to hydrate, condition, nourish and soften, and plant-based fruit oils (including cranberry seed oil) which help lips look and feel healthy by smoothing and protecting, also including grapeseed oil which smooths and softens, and additionally vitamin C and E to protect the skin.  I do wish it contained SPF.  It feels wonderful on my lips.  It is not too thick and yet it is moisturizing.   As described it has a light buttery texture. It is not greasy feeling.  I love the color and that you can use it lightly or apply more layers for a deeper richer color.  My lips feel great immediately after using this product. It has the slightest faint sweet scent. I like that the packaging is like a metal tin and that the cap screws on so it won't fall off in my bag.

reviews.review_title: more a balm lipstick than a tint
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: strong color for what's supposed to be a tint.  i was looking for a more subtle tint. i have a love/hate for the packaging.     love the screw cap.  hate the fact it's lipstick style -  i left this in my purse and it softened to the point when I applied it the top portion of it came off.    i won't buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating with a pretty color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: (Gifted by fresh) - This lip treatment instantly hydrated my lips and left a stunning color! I can definitely see it being worn as a day to day balm that looks like high end lipsticks/lip gloss. I love that it has a faint fragrance and a locking packaging.

I have been using this lip balm since I was in high school and it is still my favorite. I love how it glides on and leaves a subtle amount of color. I will be purchasing every single color that they have. gifted by fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had purchased a set of the small one's last fall and loved them. This regular size I just bought in July 2022 is different. I have a problem with lip products making my lips hurt after a few days of use and sadly this new one did that. I'm so bummed. It is a really nice natural shade and I'm sure many people will love it.

Thank you Fresh company for realizing that some of the ingredients needed to be put to the side and  good ones be put in.

(gifted by fresh)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by fresh their SUGAR Lip Treatment in Icon (a classic red) in exchange for my honest review. I have always been an avid fresh lip balm/treatment user, but it has always been the Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm or just the clear lip balm. It glided on oh so smoothly and did not leave a bad taste in my mouth. This was my first time venturing out to colors, and it did not disappoint. I was worried that it would make my lips too red, but it gave me a beautiful sheer tint color and enhanced my natural lip color. Now I know that I can wear red, and I am able to apply more if I want a buildable red shade. I loved how hydrating and moisturizing my lips felt. Infused with sugar and plant-based fruit oils, this lip balm made my lips feel so healthy. I will have to try out more colors.

reviews.review_text: I got this complimentary from fresh and it is the perfect product for the clean girl makeup aesthetic because it gives a cute little tint, is hydrating, but also looks natural. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using these lip balms exclusively for years. I loved the creamy texture, shine and sheerness, and found them to be very moisturizing and long-lasting, which is a really hard combination to find. I recently restocked four of my staple colors not realizing that they had been reformulated. As a few others have commented, the new formula leaves a matte finish (previous formula was more shiny), feels dry on my lips  (previous formula felt creamy), is not moisturizing and starts wearing off in less than an hour (previous formula lasted for several hours). So basically, all the things I loved about these balms is gone. :-( I will not be repurchasing and will begin my search for a replacement that I hope I love as much as I did this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

The new formula isnu2019t as smooth and creamy, itu2019s less moisturizing, and the color has less staying power. I find myself reapplying several times an hour, which was never the case before. If you loved the formula with SPF as much as I did, you might want to think twice about restocking.

reviews.review_text: One of the best chapsticks I have tried. It applied so smoothly and only a little bit was needed for good pigment! I love it!! A bit pricey but my lips felt super nourished. Itu2019s advertised as 24 hours but I donu2019t think it lasted that long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip tint. I really think they reformulated, based on the other fresh lip tints I own from a few years ago. Those all have the same problem: they're way too soft, and they melt and deform in any sort of heat. It actually makes them messy to bring anywhere and irritating to apply. This new lip tint in plum has none of those problems - the consistency is way firmer, and for that reason it's way easier to get a consistent layer of pigment. The shade is also soo beautiful u2014 it's a sheer blackberry, and I could see it working for a whole range of skin tones. Same delicious fruity scent and same hydrating qualities as the old formula. Just a way better and more sophisticated consistency. This was gifted to me by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love lip treatments especially because I have dry chapped lips, this stuff really helped! It keeps my lips moisturized all day and itu2019s great prep before apply my lip stick. The shade color is really nice too. I would definitely recommend this product ! Gifted by fresh

My wife is a huge fan of fresh and she was so excited to use this one! This is such a great product, sheu2019s always been a fan but this new scent was even better than what sheu2019s used before. Such a great one. Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a great tinted lip balm that can bring me color but not dry out my lips. I use skin care that dries out my lips but this product brings them back to life. The vitamin C and E along with the oils in this product really hydrate and nourish my lips. The color is perfect and subtle, very natural looking. This product was complimentary from Fresh but I love it, totally recommend!

I recieved this complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I love the shade it's in because it's just a tad darker than my natural lip color & is buildable. It's incredibly hydrating and leaves my lips so soft. Would love to get this in the other shades too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment wears well, it lasts several hours before I need to reapply.  I have larger lips that tend to become dry very easily. The Lip Treatment keeps my lips moisturized and the color infused in the Treatment means there is no need to apply a lipstick over it. Sometimes I put on a lipliner underneath to make the color last longer. I also like that the cap is a twist off, I haven't had any problems with it coming off in my bag. This product was complimentary from Fresh in exchange for an honest review. (not sure why Peony wasn't an option in the dropdown)

This was gifted to me by Fresh. I love how it is hydrating while also giving my lips a little color that looks natural. It contains vitamin C and E along with fruit oils. Vitamin E is really good to help with dry lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This item was gifted by Fresh in exchange for an honest review. The Fresh Beauty Sugar Lip Treatment in Papaya is good for when you want to moisturize your lips, keep them moisturized, and add a pop of color. The variation u201cPapayau201d definitely does not refer to a scent or taste, as I detect no fragrance or flavor when I wear this. Which is not a bad thing since that keeps me from constantly licking my lips or eating the product off. The shade to me looks more like an almost cherry red as opposed to an orange, which is the color I think of when I think of papaya. It applies with a medium sheen (not too glossy). If I do not reapply the lip treatment throughout the day, the sheen dries down to a pigmented stain. Another thing I enjoy about the sugar lip treatment is the overall presentation of the packaging. It is housed in a metal case that twists on instead of a case that you pop on and off. You can securely carry this in your pocket or handbag. No need to worry about the top coming off, and the product making a mess in your pocket or your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I have loved Fresh Sugar lip balm for years! I tend to have super dry lips, and I live in a dry climate, so Sugar has been my savior lip treatment. The formula was apparently in the process of changing to remove the SPF, so itu2019s been hard to find in stores and online for the past few months as they cleared out the old product and brought in the new. I bought it in Bloom (my old favorite) and Papaya (a brand new color) as soon as I discovered it was back. (I tried to select Papaya to show in my review but the app is being weird! Itu2019s the color Iu2019m wearing in the second pic.)   So, the good news: the smell is still delightful, like vanilla-lemon? Iu2019ve never quite been able to put my finger on it! The colors are beautifulu2014Fresh doesnu2019t offer a huge selection, but my previous experience with almost all of the colors is that theyu2019re all very wearable, and many leave a lovely stain on your lips. The Papaya is BEAUTIFUL. Itu2019s a pretty coral pink, less intense than the actual Coral color that Sugar also comes in. The Bloom is also pretty, a subtle mauve-y pink, not as rosy as Rose. The formula swipes on smooth, not sticky, very easy to wear. The packaging (chunky tube with a twist off lid, matches the color of the balm) is still perfect.   And the bad news? Well, Iu2019ll miss the sunscreen. Since itu2019s the main thing Iu2019ve worn, I donu2019t have a good SPF alternative for my lips. They removed the shimmer from Bloom. It was so pretty with the shimmer! Pretty bummed about that. But the biggest thing is that I THINK they changed the formula to u201cstabilizeu201d the product. (Raise your hand if youu2019ve ever melted your Sugar in your hot car/pocket/purse!) I could be wrong about that, but given that it feels like it takes a lot more swipes to build up that buttery feeling Iu2019m used to, and then it still never quite achieves the same feeling, Iu2019m going to go out on a limb and say they changed it. Iu2019ll probably continue to buy it, but itu2019s just not quite the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh! Super nice lip balm, the application is quite good since it glides very well on the lips, you can immediately feel that pleasant feeling of hydration and softness and with a very good duration even after the product wears out the lips feel so soft, love the presentation. I also like that it comes in buildable shade so that I can hide the pale color of my lips.. My lips are not only hydrated but also softer, looks healthy and kissable..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It keeps my lips so hydrated and nourished and the subtle color is so beautiful. Love that I can make it as light or as bold as I want. If Iu2019m going to use a product at this phase of my life I want it to also do something beneficial for the health of my skin/lips and this is definitely a new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product.  I got the lip treatment in the shade Rose and it was gifted by Fresh. I was a little skeptical at first sight because itu2019s a rich red color and Iu2019m not a fan of red on me. But once applied I realized itu2019s a very sheer color payoff. The color is so beautiful and very hydrating. The color doesnu2019t get too intense but it is buildable. This balm also has vitamins C and E to aid in hydration. I tend to have very dry lips and after applying this my lips felt so soft and supple pretty much for the rest of the day. I didnu2019t feel like I had to reapply constantly which I love. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants a hydrating balm with a tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite lip products, this just leaves a hint of rosy color that makes my lips look alive / like a mlbb color, and itu2019s easy to apply and comes packaged in a tube that twists to close tight. Recommended except the color doesnu2019t last long. Gifted by fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh in exchanged for my honest review. This lip balm is very hydrating and made my lips feel soft after applying. It did not feel sticky or heavy on my lips but still allowed my lips to receive a nice, soft tint. It smells very pleasing and the pink shade is buildable, you can apply more and the pigment will show more on your lips. Nice size that is great for on-the-go application. The ingredients list is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice tinted lip balm, very buttery and refreshing . The color is pretty and buildable and the packaging is so beautiful. It also has such a nice subtle smell that I enjoy. Complimentary from Fresh.

reviews.review_title: Super hydrating w/ a nice tint
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I consistently have dry lips that never seem to be hydrated enough. This lip treatment truly helped with that so much! Since itu2019s tinted, I donu2019t use it as much as Iu2019d typically use a lip balmu2026 I got the u2018roseu2019 shade gifted by Fresh  in exchange for my review. I love that they have such a wide shade range but I think next time Iu2019ll try clear! Itu2019s the best lip balm/treatment Iu2019ve tried in a long time. If youu2019re into tints, this gives a nice flush to the lips. Super comfortable on, and the packaging feels luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been loving this lip treatment. My lips feel very moisturized after using it.  I love that it is made with sugar, vitamin c & e, and fruit oils. It has a nice subtle smell, which is very enjoyable. The formula is very nourishing yet buildable. Rose adds a nice flush of color to my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment really helped hydrate my dry lips. I love the color I got it in, it doesnu2019t show too much it is super subtle and thatu2019s what I love. Makes my lips feel fresh and great! I was gifted by Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received  this new lip treatment gifted by Fresh Beauty smells delicious, packaging is really pretty, I love that leaves your lips feeling hydrated and smooth. The color looks very bright but once you put it on looks perfect just like healthy lips! I post on IG tutorials and new products, I would appreciate if you follow me @glam_byalexa thanks! Have a great day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Fresh for my honest review. Fresh is a no-brainer for lip care and the Rose Sugar Lip Treatment is no different. This has the same smooth and hydrating formula with the perfect amount of tint. The color is a beautiful sheer rose tint thatu2019s great for bare skin or no-makeup makeup looks. Definitely great for my purse stash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product felt amazing on my lips! the color was a beautiful buildable color. it felt hydrating and I notices that my lips looked smoother after wearing it all day. the ingredients are very effective. I was gifted by fresh but would purchase it with my own money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always struggle with dry skin and dry lips, so I always, always have to use lip balms. This Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment is so perfect for the lips, not like EOS which makes lips worse chapped. I like the clean ingredients that hydrates lips for all day and buildable or sheer peony color. Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very hydrating balm that helped get rid of my chronic, dry cracked lips! I am not a big fan of the scent, but it definitely did the job of keeping my lips super hydrated! Definitely recommend. Complimentary from fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh. This is my new favorite rose lip treatment for summer. It has such a pretty nourishing and buildable pigmented rose color. My lips looked and felt so dry before putting this on. Now they feel moisturized and supple. This is made with sugar,vitamin c & e and fruit oils. Lightly scented and goes on smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Fresh Beauty for me to review! I am loving the texture of this lip treatment and the subtle pop of color! My lips feel so soft and hydrated and it amplify my natural lip shade so Well

Gifted by Fresh. This is so amazing! I love that it really hydrates my lips and doesnu2019t dry them out. The peony color is so beautiful and sheer on my lips. The color can be built up the more you apply, but I like to keep it light and simple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is so different than what Iu2019m used to, I put it on and it actually lasts for a very long time. Iu2019m obsessed with how it feels on, and the scent. Itu2019s so sweet and sugary, and the pink color is so natural and gorgeous. The texture is buttery smooth and has the perfect amount of shine. My lips feel so hydrated long after applying and the color lasts just as long. The pink heavy weight packaging is so luxe, I absolutely love it too! The color is so buildable also, I have one layer on in the photo and it can build multiple shades darker with more layers. Obsessed!! Gifted by Fresh, but I just ordered 2 other colors and the clear because I love it that much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the clean ingredients in this! the color was very buildable so if I wanted a light tint, I could achieve that, but if I wanted something darker I could get that too. it was supperrrr hydrating and nourishing on my lips, very comfortable to wear! this was gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Freshu2019s sugar lip treatment in papaya (kindly gifted to me by Fresh) is an intensely hydrating lip balm that contains beeswax and a variety of fruit oils (like avocado and lemon peel). It does not seem to contain any actual papaya, so I suppose thatu2019s just the name of the color. The scent is sweet like a sugary lemon wafer. The treatment does contain added fragrance as well as added color, which creates a pretty buildable pink-red on the lips. One note: the tube is luxe and metallic, and the top twists off (so donu2019t try to pull)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lip balm! I got the shade Rose and it leaves a nice pinkish-red tint on the lips. It is also very hydrating, lasts a long time on the lips and has a nice light scent to it. Canu2019t wait to get more of these! Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything fresh releases and this is no exception. Leaves my lips feeling soft and moisturized while also providing such a nice natural tint! I absolutely love the smell as well. I use it everyday! Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh Beauty in exchange for my honest review. I love the shade on my lips, it's very pretty and a great summer color. It feels hydrating on my lips and its smooth to apply. If you're sensitive though I'd be careful since the product is scented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good! It does also have a slight tint to it but I really like how soft it makes my lips feel. I would recommend to anyone who wants to try a new lip treatment! Also it is pretty affordable. It was gifted by Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the subtle red hue and soft, hydrating feel of this lip product. It goes on smooth and is not sticky or heavy feeling. Perfect for an every day lip treatment with an added touch of glam with the color! *This product was gifted to me

I haven't noticed much change in the hydration of my lips if I'm being honest as this lip balm doesn't last very long, but the sheer color is a very pretty your lips but better look that I am enjoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
