I noticed a difference in the softness of my lips after 1 application. Check out my before and after! Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh this product in the color plum in exchange for my review, and I honestly love it! Itu2019s super hydrating and has the most beautiful buildable color. The packaging is super chic and gives it a luxury feel. I will definitely continue to use this and purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always love Fresh products so i was excited to try the Sugar Lip Treatment gifted by Fresh! The packaging is really pretty and food quality. It gives a gorgeous tint on the lips! it feels super hydrated and moisturized. Would highly recommend if you have chapped lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not only is this deeply hydrating, but for a balm type product, the pigmentation is impressive! Itu2019s delicate and feminine and not so bold that I canu2019t wear it to work. Since getting it gifted by Fresh, itu2019s been a purse staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Fresh Beauty in exchange for my honest review. This lip treatment is super smooth and buttery, and feels great on the lips. It adds sheer and natural color to the lips that is buildable. I loved the rosy shade of this. It is basically your lips but better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a hydrating lip balm. I was scared that it was over pigmented but it delivers just the right amount of tint. It also smells amazing. I like that is product doesnu2019t melt in the hot summer. I just wish it had spf. gifted by fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One swipe of color across the lips for me and I have a nice tint, 2 swipes and I have full color.  This is a great shade to keep in my purse on a night out because itu2019s an all-in-one touch up for me, rather than needing lipstick and some kind of gloss to keep my lips from feeling dry.  I like the new formula and Iu2019m glad that they updated it to adhere to international safety standards!  I received SLT complimentary from Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and smell of the lip balm. It subtly pigments the lips and pops some life into them. The casing it comes in is also very cute and Chic. Will def be using daily and on nights out with the girls. Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm has a nice color. It's great for daily use when you just want to add a little color to your lips. I have a very pale lips so I always use this type of balm to improve texture and appearance. Itu2019s a little pricey but even with daily use it lasts for months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a years long fan of Fresh lip balms, and the classic Rose shade is my favorite. This is extremely similar to the original formula that I love, which is a creamy, buttery balm thatu2019s non sticky. Itu2019s worth nothing it doesnu2019t last long but reapplying is a pleasure. This has a very light lemon sugar scent, but I prefer the original scent more. As much as I love this lip balm, the fact that they removed the SPF 15 is a huge drawback for me; itu2019s one of the best reasons Iu2019ve liked them. I used to wear this all the time during the day but Iu2019ll need to switch now, which is a bummer. The formula and packaging of this lip balm canu2019t be beat, but the lack of SPF is truly a big deal for me. I wonu2019t repurchase when this is done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells a bit chemical-y but otherwise pretty good. You get the peony smell lightly, the color is mild, and goes on very smooth. The size is perfect for my little purses. The price is good for the product, especially for something from Fresh. Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Guys, this product is everything I have been looking for. It has good ingredients, a buildable color that is perfect for everyday, and it makes my lips feel soooo nice. I will never be leaving this product behind, I am obsessed! This was gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging feels so expensive and luxurious! The color is absolutely beautiful and it smells delicious! Leaves my sensitive lips feeling so nourished and gives them a beautiful light tint, 10/10 lip balm. Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying this lip treatment by fresh and totally see a big difference in my lips!! My lips feel super smooth and plump! Totally obsessed with this lip treatment totally need all the flavors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Fresh. This is the perfect lip product for anytime of year. The consistency is so nourishing and feels great as you wear it through the day. I also love that you can customize the shade with the buildable color application!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will def order more. Donu2019t know yet how long it lasts but even reapplying it throughout the day wouldnt bother me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm, I received it complimentary from Fresh. Itu2019s very hydrating and pigmented while still feeling light. Itu2019s honestly helped keep my lips soft and smooth since I got it and I only apply it once in the morning. Itu2019s also a sheer color so I can do one application for a subtle change or I can layer it for a deeper color. Itu2019s also made from natural ingredients, which is always a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy fresh sugar lip balms because they're so soft and comfortable! This new papaya one has a lovely tint. It's my first tinted lip balm from fresh as I usually opt for the clear ones. This goes on just as smooth and initially the color is beautiful, however long term it's really not all that hydrating and when the color fades I'm left with dry patches on my lips that the color has stuck to. You definitely need to exfoliate and I wish the color lasted a bit longer. I'm going to stick to clear. Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Papaya shade, complimentary from Fresh, has an initial sheer coral color, but impressive in its ability to build up color with each additional application. I've used Fresh lip balms since I was in high school MANY years ago and I'm always impressed with the texture and hydration it provides. I don't unfortunately care too much about the color as its not my preferred shade I like for myself, but thought why not try something new! Next time, ill stick to my usual colors but definitely within the Fresh line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product and I truly fell in love with it. The mask is super hydrating but not oily. I also loved the color and how natural it felt. I like that it seemed like a chapstick but I could wear it with a full face of makeup and not look crazy!! Truly love this product! I was gifted by Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh I love this @freshbeauty Peony shade and I love how it feels on the lips!  Itu2019s the perfect throw-on-anytime day or night lip balm with enough color that you donu2019t have to apply on top. It can easily be worn alone. Your lips but better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

I love how smooth this appleis to my lips and it keeps them healthy and hydrated no matter the time of year. I also adore the buildable color, one swipe gives a nice rosy tint or you can build for a more vava voom pout!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was gifted by fresh and smells good and is a nice balm but it didnu2019t stay on for that long and my lips would dry up pretty quickly after it went away. I had to reapply it multiple times throughout the day and at some point I just switched to a different chapstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh SLT Papaya Absolutely love how this made my lips feel, I used this the night before I went to bed. Waited a whole 24 hours to see the difference within my lips. And when I say amazing !   Amazing 10/10 I can literally use this every time for smoother, softer lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh SLT Rose is hydrating to even the dryest lips and gives my lip a beautiful light tint that looks healthy. You can also build it up several layers for a stronger pink color, it is definitely buildable. gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve really loved using this product, I just came back from a really dry place for vacation and my skin was begging for some hydration. This lip treatment immediately fixed my dry and cracked lips and I loved being able to use the buildable color so it works for any and every occasion.   Complimentary from fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Fresh in exchange for my honest review. I'm not much of a lipstick girl but I love wearing a gloss or a tinted balm when I want a bit more color so this product is right up my alley. It's got all the benefits of a balm but you get that added bonus of sheer to buildable color without the mess of high pigment lipstick. With one swipe I get a nice gentle flush of pink that just brings my lips to life and then when I build it up with a few layers it gets more intense while still letting my lips show through so it looks more effortless. The shade rose is perfect for when you want a flushed but still natural look. I love that the ingredients are clean and that the formula is hydrating and smoothing. It makes my lips look juicy and feel nourished. If I haven't been eating one application can last me a few hours without needing to reapply. The fact that the cap screws on is a big bonus as well (no more mess in your pockets or bags!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Fresh in exchange for my honest review.  I love how moisturized and juicy my lips feel when using this product. It has the perfect, sheer shade that is very natural looking and buildable. I also appreciate the fact that it doesn't feel too thick or sticky.  My favorite part are the ingredients such as plant based fruit oils!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Fresh, their Sugar lip treatment is so amazing! Iu2019m totally OBESSED with the light tint it gives you while also making your lips feel super hydrated. The color is such a nice light pink, but itu2019s also buildable on your lips. Totally a new staple for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The Papaya shade was gifted by Fresh to me. It was super hydrating giving me soft and plump lips! It added a very stubble but buildable color perfect for the summertime. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a tinted and nourishing lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been disappointed in a product gifted by  fresh and this experience was no different. Their sugar lip balms are so smooth and smell nice. I love them and I highly recommend. I will definitely be buying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by fresh, and I havenu2019t try any other fresh lip treatments, but this one feels so good, prevents my lips from chapping while giving a beautiful color at the same time ! It doesnu2019t have a scent which I really like !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I receive this lip treatment complimentary from Fresh Beauty in exchange for my honest opinion. It helps hydrate my lip and the hydrating seems long lasting. It also contains vitamin C and E that help nourish my lip to make them look more plump and smooth. I like that the color is buildable. For daily use, I prefer lighter color (as opposed to bold colors), so I use 1 layer of this lip treatment and it looks great and natural.

reviews.review_title: A very nice no-make up lip

But not sure if I would repurchase since it was gifted by Fresh

A nourishing pop of color that can be built upon with sugar from beet root and sugar cane. The best part is knowing my lips are being nourished and hydrated especially during winter where lips are typically dry. This was gifted by Fresh

I had to purposefully try to smell the scent to catch it.  I love all Freshu2019s lip products. The formulas keep your lips so hydrating and looking smooth!

Gifted by Fresh, I was able to try such an amazing product out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip product! I was so excited when Fresh gifted me this lip balm. This brand is one of my favorites because the products always smell so good and moisturize my lips. The sheer rose color is also very pretty!

reviews.review_title: Would recommend if in your budget
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these fresh treatments, and this is the first one Iu2019ve tried. I got this gifted by fresh, but my review is not affected by that. Would recommend if it is in your budget.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: One of the best lip balms Iu2019ve ever used. I love how soothing and hydrating my lips feel after using this product. Plus the scent is amazing, these lip balms never fail me. I recommend you try them youu2019ll be hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh! Honestlyyyyyyy this product is such a classic, easily one of the most luxurious lip balms in the game tbh! Highly recommend to get one for a chill easy flex, and to keep your lips smooth and moisturized :) EXPENSIVE THOUGH

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is so nice and buildable I love carrying it around with me for the perfect pick me up with every face. I love it and the way it makes my lip feel all day. Definitely my favorite lip product. Gifted by fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Fresh but this is my honest opinion. This is a really nice tinted lip balm. The berry shade is really pretty and matches any makeup look, as well as a no-makeup makeup look. I love the nourishing ingredients like grape seed oil, castor oil and jojoba oil. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It has a sheer red tint that is very buildable and adds a nice swash of color to the lips. The packaging is premium and has a twist lock cap so you don't have to worry about the cap coming loose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Hydrating with a hint of color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip treatment! The color is gorgeous, and it doesnu2019t pill on your lips like some products do. You can continue building color with it if youu2019d like, or just leave it as a slight tint. This product was gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh. Iu2019ve been a fan of fresh for years, and this product is magical. My lips have been so dry recently, and this product has moisturized and hydrated my lips completely! I highly recommend this product. Packaging is cute too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This sugar lip treatment gifted to me by Fresh is probably one of my new favorites. The packaging is very pretty and sleek, and I love how it is a twist top. It makes my lips feel soft, but I would prefer it to feel a bit more hydrating. I do like how the product contains several vitamins and fruit oils.

reviews.review_text: This new lip Balm utilizes moisturizing and barrier-supporting natural ingredients like prickly pear oil and sea succulent extract. Over time, that stronger barrier means even dryness-prone lips hold onto moisture more effectively. Gifted by Fresh.

WELL this is the best of both worlds because itu2019s super hydrating and has the best lip color! It makes my lips the cutest shade of pink. I will definitely be purchasing.

Great lip balm, adds a really pretty amount of pigment but also leaves the lips feeling smooth and soft . I'm obsessed with this stuff!  Smells super ,  One of the best. Very nice and somewhat moisturizing. Goes on easy and has an average staying power gifted by Fresh
